name: Sandrone
desc: The Seventh of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, known as Marionette.

customize.text: Song of the Welkin Moon Teaser: Moonlit Ballad of the Night

<color=#ffd780>July 22, 2025</color>
Sandrone, Fatui Harbinger. Codename: "Marionette"
"The Frostmoon Scions, again? Hah... A laughably futile rebellion."

<color=#ffd780>September 15, 2025</color>
Greetings, Travelers! The latest emojis from Genshin Impact are now available on HoYoLAB~
Paimon's Paintings include a collection of chibi emojis of various Genshin Impact characters. We hope you like them! Paimon will continue to paint more cute emojis for everyone~

customize.name: Fatui
customize.desc: A Snezhnayan organization that is loyal to the Tsaritsa and has spread out all over the continent. Its Harbingers are on the hunt for the Gnoses.

customize.text: Sandrone is the Seventh of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers.

customize.name: Nod-Krai
customize.desc:
The moon-blessed land located in the northwestern regions of Teyvat.

Follow the silver thread spun by the new moon, traverse biting gales and desolate tundras as the snow-kissed lakes, fractured like mirrors, reflect their ageless, glacial radiance. The days are bitterly short, and the night stretches on like a dark, yawning maw. But even then, the light and song of the Welkin Moon will dance gently across the faces of visiting travelers. Up at ye towers, and let your lanterns blaze into the darkness! Until the day comes... when true moonlight bathes this land once more.

customize.text: Marionette leads the Kuuvahki Experimental Design Bureau and considers Nod-Krai a dominion of the Fatui.

The Harbinger created Katheryne, a bionic puppet.
Pulonia
Sandrone's robot

customize.name: Tartaglia
customize.desc: No. 11 of The Harbingers, also known as "Childe." His name is highly feared on the battlefield.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Marionette</color>
She always seems engrossed in her research. Hmm... I wonder if those machines have anything to do with her? Anyway, I've only met her a few times, but every time she looked like she wanted to murder me. I have no idea what I possibly could have done to annoy her, though.

customize.name: Scaramouche
customize.desc: The former sixth of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, created by Raiden Ei.

customize.name: Wanderer
customize.desc: A wayfaring figure whose identity is a mystery. He dresses like a mountain ascetic, but he certainly does not act the part.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Marionette</color>
She has a terrible personality and cares for nothing outside of her own research. But even with that amount of dedication, she still produced a copious amount of garbage, and could only secure a ranking that's still one whole place beneath my own. How pitiful.

customize.name: Arlecchino
customize.desc: "The Knave," Fourth of the Fatui Harbingers. A poised, ruthless diplomat. To the children in the House of the Hearth, she is their feared yet dependable "Father."

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About Marionette</color>
I have little interest in her. She is extremely... passionate about her research and does not appear in public often. In fact, many of our officers have yet to see her at all. Compared to, let's say, someone who would go so far as to create segments of themselves to better wander across the land, I suppose you could say she is at the other end of the extreme.

customize.name: Columbina
customize.desc: The Third of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers, known as Damselette and Moon Maiden. She is a Moon Goddess named Kuutar.

customize.text:
<color=#ffd780>About her time in the Fatui</color>
Take walks, watch the moon, sometimes sing... But, I came to do that last one less and less after Sandrone forbade it.
She praised it, actually. But, I had only recently joined the Fatui then, and she said my singing set the others on edge.
Because, for those not in the know, it seemed like I was about to use... some sort of power.
Oh, and there was another reason. She said she did most of her research at night, so if I sang during the day, it would disturb her attempts to catch up on sleep.
So, I used to just sing outside her door at night instead. But, still. She always chased me away...
